title: Gamification-Enhanced Mathematics Learning Effectiveness Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Mathematical Concepts (Secondary School Level)
context.additional_context: Online learning environment incorporating gamification elements for practicing professionals needing enhanced mathematical practical skills. Facilitates flexible learning using personal devices

learning_goals: In game-based learning environments, learners apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy.
Learners utilize psychological flow states—formed through in-game narratives and aesthetic elements—to enhance learning outcomes.
Through a gamification feedback system, learners improve their math learning progress by at least three levels.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
